TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBox/ObjectCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListBox.ObjectCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 代表 中項目的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of items in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會儲存在顯示的項目。The class stores the items displayed in the . 有兩個定義內的其他集合可讓您判斷哪些項目會選取在此集合中的類別。There are two other collections defined within the class that enable you to determine what items are selected within this collection. 類別會提供屬性和方法來判斷哪些項目內，已選取，雖然類別可讓您判斷哪些索引內已選取。The class provides properties and methods for determining what items are selected within the , while the class enables you to determine what indexes within the are selected. 有數種方式將項目新增至集合。There are a number of ways to add items to the collection. 方法讓您能夠加入至集合的單一物件。The method provides the ability to add a single object to the collection. 若要加入至集合的物件數目，方法，您可以建立項目的陣列，並將它指派給方法。To add a number of objects to the collection, you create an array of items and assign it to the method. 如果您想要在集合內的特定位置插入物件，您可以使用方法。If you want to insert an object at a specific location within the collection, you can use the method. 若要移除的項目，您可以使用方法或方法，如果您知道項目位於集合。To remove items, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the item is located within the collection. 方法可讓您移除而不是使用集合中的所有項目方法以移除單一項目一次。The method enables you to remove all items from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single item at a time. 您也可以操作的項目使用屬性。You can also manipulate the items of a by using the property. 如果您使用屬性，以將項目加入，您可以檢視中的項目使用屬性，但您無法加入或移除項目從清單中使用的方法。If you use the property to add items to a , you can view the items in the using the property but you cannot add or remove items from the list using the methods of the . 方法和屬性的加入和移除項目，除了也提供方法來尋找集合中的項目。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing items, the also provides methods to find items within the collection. 方法可讓您判斷物件是否為集合的成員。The method enables you to determine whether an object is a member of the collection. 一旦您知道項目位於集合中，您可以使用方法，以判斷項目位於集合。Once you know that the item is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where the item is located within the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何為主控描繪splittunneling屬性設`OwnerDrawVariable`值和處理和事件。The following code example demonstrates an owner-drawn by setting the property to the `OwnerDrawVariable` value and handling the and events. 它也會示範設定並屬性，並使用方法。It also demonstrates setting the and properties and using the method. 若要執行此範例中，將它貼到空白表單匯入命名空間和命名空間。To run this example, paste it into an empty form that imports the namespace and the namespace. 呼叫`InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox`從表單的建構函式或`Load`方法。Call `InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox` from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 的新執行個體，這個執行個體以其他 為基礎。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of based on another .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法建立此類別的執行個體，而不將它與控制項。You cannot create an instance of this class without associating it with a control. 這個版本的建構函式可讓您使用現有的執行個體中指定的項目類別來建立時，項目加入至集合。This version of the constructor enables you to use the items specified in an existing instance of the class to add items to the collection when it is created. 您可以使用這個建構函式來使用在另一個指定的項目與此集合的控制項。You can use this constructor to use the items specified in another control with this collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 Add(object item) cil managed
Public Function Add (item As Object) As Integer

param.name: item
param.span: 物件，表示要加入至集合中的項目。

span.span: An object representing the item to add to the collection.

summary.span: 將項目加入至 的項目清單。

span.span: Adds an item to the list of items for a .

returns.span: 集合中項目之以零起始的索引；如果已呼叫 則為 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index of the item in the collection, or -1 if has been called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的屬性設定為`true`，依字母順序的項目插入至清單。If the property of the is set to `true`, the item is inserted into the list alphabetically. 否則，在清單結尾處插入項目。Otherwise, the item is inserted at the end of the list. 若要插入的特定位置的清單方塊中的項目，請使用方法。To insert an item into the list box at a specific position, use the method. 若要加入的清單方塊中的單一作業中的一組項目，請使用方法。To add a set of items to the list box in a single operation, use the method. 如果您想要使用方法來將大量的項目新增至清單，請使用並方法，以避免重新繪製每次從項目加入清單之前的所有項目都會新增至清單。If you want to use the method to add a large number of items to the list, use the and methods to prevent the from repainting each time an item is added to the list until all items are added to the list. 新增項目時，它會先排序的項目，然後再新增新的項目更有效率。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items. 將物件加入至集合中，當以查看是否會先檢查屬性類別具有從物件取得項目文字時，指定參考成員的名稱。When an object is added to the collection, the first checks to see if the property of the class has the name of a member from the object specified to reference when obtaining the item text. 如果屬性沒有指定，成員接著會呼叫取得要顯示在清單中的文字物件的方法。If the property does not have a member specified, the then calls the method of the object to obtain the text to display in the list. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制項資料行中顯示多個項目，並可以有多個控制項的清單中選取的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that displays multiple items in columns and can have more than one item selected in the control's list. 如需範例程式碼新增到 50 個項目使用方法類別，然後再選取三個項目從清單中使用方法。The code for the example adds 50 items to the using the method of the class and then selects three items from the list using the method. 程式碼接著會顯示值從集合 (透過屬性) 和(透過屬性)。The code then displays values from the collection (through the property) and the (through the property). 此範例程式碼會要求位於並從呼叫。This example requires that the code is located in and called from a . [!code-cpp[Classic ListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ListBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ListBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ListBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的屬性設定為`true`，項目會依字母順序插入至清單。If the property of the is set to `true`, the items are inserted into the list alphabetically. 否則，項目會插入它們出現在陣列中的順序。Otherwise, the items are inserted in the order that they occur within the array. 這個方法通常會傳遞的陣列物件，而陣列的任何型別的物件可以傳遞至這個方法。This method is typically passed an array of objects, but an array of any type of object can be passed to this method. 將物件加入至集合中，當以查看是否會先檢查屬性類別具有從物件取得項目文字時，指定參考成員的名稱。When an object is added to the collection, the first checks to see if the property of the class has the name of a member from the object specified to reference when obtaining the item text. 如果屬性沒有指定，成員接著會呼叫取得要顯示在清單中的文字物件的方法。If the property does not have a member specified, the then calls the method of the object to obtain the text to display in the list. 使用此方法將項目加入時，您不需要呼叫和來最佳化效能的方法。When using this method to add items to the , you do not need to call the and methods to optimize performance. 新增項目時，它會先排序的項目，然後再新增新的項目更有效率。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items. 您可以使用這個方法，將一組項目新增至清單，或重複使用儲存在不同的項目。You can use this method to add a group of items to the list or to reuse the items stored in a different . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何為主控描繪splittunneling屬性設`OwnerDrawVariable`值和處理和事件。The following code example demonstrates an owner-drawn by setting the property to the `OwnerDrawVariable` value and handling the and events. 它也會示範設定並屬性，並使用方法。It also demonstrates setting the and properties and using the method. 若要執行此範例中，將它貼到空白表單匯入命名空間和命名空間。To run this example, paste it into an empty form that imports the namespace and the namespace. 呼叫`InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox`從表單的建構函式或`Load`方法。Call `InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox` from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的屬性設定為`true`，項目會依字母順序插入至清單。If the property of the is set to `true`, the items are inserted into the list alphabetically. 否則，項目會插入它們出現在陣列中的順序。Otherwise, the items are inserted in the order that they occur within the array. 這個方法通常會傳遞的陣列物件，而陣列的任何型別的物件可以傳遞至這個方法。This method is typically passed an array of objects, but an array of any type of object can be passed to this method. 將物件加入至集合中，當以查看是否會先檢查屬性類別具有從物件取得項目文字時，指定參考成員的名稱。When an object is added to the collection, the first checks to see if the property of the class has the name of a member from the object specified to reference when obtaining the item text. 如果屬性沒有指定，成員接著會呼叫取得要顯示在清單中的文字物件的方法。If the property does not have a member specified, the then calls the method of the object to obtain the text to display in the list. 使用此方法將項目加入時，您不需要呼叫和來最佳化效能的方法。When using this method to add items to the , you do not need to call the and methods to optimize performance. 新增項目時，它會先排序的項目，然後再新增新的項目更有效率。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items. 您可以使用這個方法重複使用儲存在不同的項目。You can use this method to reuse the items stored in a different .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您插入項目中的特定位置。This method enables you to insert an item at a specific position within the . 如果的屬性設為 true，項目中新增正確的位置，不論中指定的值已排序的清單內`index`參數。If the property of the is set to true, the item is added in the correct position within the sorted list regardless of the values specified in the `index` parameter. 將物件加入至集合中，當以查看是否會先檢查屬性類別具有從物件取得項目文字時，指定參考成員的名稱。When an object is added to the collection, the first checks to see if the property of the class has the name of a member from the object specified to reference when obtaining the item text. 如果屬性沒有指定，成員接著會呼叫取得要顯示在清單中的文字物件的方法。If the property does not have a member specified, the then calls the method of the object to obtain the text to display in the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您從清單移除項目時，在清單中的後續項目索引將會變更。When you remove an item from the list, the indexes change for subsequent items in the list. 已移除的項目相關的所有資訊都會都刪除。All information about the removed item is deleted. 您可以使用這個方法來指定要從清單中移除的實際項目，然後從清單中移除特定項目。You can use this method to remove a specific item from the list by specifying the actual item to remove from the list. 若要指定要移除而不是項目本身之項目的索引，使用方法。To specify the index of the item to remove instead of the item itself, use the method. 若要從清單中移除所有項目，使用方法。To remove all items from the list, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed
abstract member RemoveAt : int -> unit override this.RemoveAt : int -> unit

param.name: index
param.span: 要移除之項目的以零為起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the item to remove.

summary.span: 移除這個集合中位於指定索引處的項目。

span.span: Removes the item at the specified index within the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您從清單移除項目時，在清單中的後續項目索引將會變更。When you remove an item from the list, the indexes change for subsequent items in the list. 已移除的項目相關的所有資訊都會都刪除。All information about the removed item is deleted. 您可以使用這個方法，從清單中移除特定項目，藉由指定要從清單中移除之項目的索引。You can use this method to remove a specific item from the list by specifying the index of the item to remove from the list. 若要指定要移除而不是項目的索引的項目，請使用方法。To specify the item to remove instead of the index to the item, use the method. 若要從清單中移除所有項目，使用方法。To remove all items from the list, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用具有屬性屬性，以將目前選取的項目移至的顯示區域中的項目清單的頂端。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the property to move the currently selected item to the top of the list of items in the display area of the . 進一步的範例將示範如何移除使用的項目方法類別，以及如何清除所有項目選取項目使用方法。The example further demonstrates how to remove items using the method of the class, and how to clear all item selection using the method. 程式碼第一次將目前選取的項目到清單頂端。The code first moves the currently selected item in the to the top of the list. 程式碼然後移除目前選取的項目之前的所有項目，並清除所有的選取項目中。The code then removes all items before the currently selected item and clears all selections in the . 這個範例需要包含項目已加入至表單和中的項目是目前選取。This example requires that a containing items is added to a form and that an item is currently selected in the . [!code-cpp[ListBox.SelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndex/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBox.SelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndex/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.SelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndex/VB/form1.vb#1)]
